name: Vi Umbra
description: Vi Umbras are a twisted anomaly of the soul, born from one soul to create its twin. They arise from profound feelings of solitude and abandonment, meant to fill the void and shield their master from such emotions. Bound to their master's will, they are bound to obey without question. Their personalities mirror that of their master, yet their extremes — both virtues and vices — are amplified to unnatural proportions.

name: Ruinhardt
description: The Ruinhardts are Naevorians who refused to feast upon mankind when the Curse took hold. Shunning the descent into madness that plagued their kin, they abandoned their village to escape its fall into depravity. Driven by hunger, they turned to devouring tainted souls—yet with every soul consumed, the corruption grew stronger. In time, it claimed them.
